headline: Bristol Myers Slouches 4% After Experts Say Its Heart Drug Will Fail

headline: Merck's Cidara Buyout Is An Opportunistic Win For Both Parties - Here's Why
summary: Merck & Co., Inc. acquires Cidara Therapeutics, Inc. for $9.2bn, boosting its pipeline with CD388's strong flu data. Click for my look at the MRK and CDTX deal.
